How it Works

Three simple steps to generate authentic replies that feel like you.

Step 1

Context Analysis

Reads the original tweet, thread, and tone before generating. Your reply always fits the conversation perfectly.

Step 2

Custom Prompts

Create your own voice and style. Define how you want to sound so every reply feels authentically yours.

Step 3

Lightning Speed

Lightning-fast generation powered by GPT-4o. Get your perfectly-tuned reply in under 2 seconds.

Frequently asked questions

Everything you need to know about AtomiX.

AtomiX is a Chrome extension that generates human-like replies on X (Twitter) using AI and your custom prompts. It reads the tweet context and produces a perfectly-tuned response in under 2 seconds.

Yes! The free plan includes 20 replies per month. If you need unlimited, you can upgrade to Pro for $9/month.

Currently, AtomiX works exclusively with X (Twitter). Support for LinkedIn and other platforms is on our roadmap.

AtomiX reads the original tweet, any conversation thread, and applies your custom prompts to generate a relevant, natural-sounding reply that fits the conversation.

Absolutely. We never store tweets or personal information. Your custom prompts are encrypted and only accessible by you.
